LanguageData.CW.SystemVolume: Steam/system volume: {0} m³ / {1} m³ System pressure: {2} kPa
LanguageData.CW.SteamFullInfo: System steam mass: {0} kg / {1} kg System net mass: {2} kg/h System max pressure: {3} kPa
LanguageData.CW.PressureInfo: Pressure needed: {0} kPa Current consumption: {1} kg/h
LanguageData.CW.ShowIdTT: Steam system id can be seen on steam components.
LanguageData.CW.EnableBrazenRotTT: Gives colonists a chance to contract brazen rot.
LanguageData.CW.ClockworkBrazenRotTT: Colonists contract brazen rot from clockwork prosthesis.
LanguageData.CW.SteamworkBrazenRotTT: Colonists contract brazen rot from steamwork prosthesis.
LanguageData.CW.LeathalBrazenRotTT: Brazen rot can kill colonists after a while. (Changing this midgame can cause mild issues.)
LanguageData.CW.BrazenRotMultiplierTT: How quickly brazen rot corrupts the body. By default it takes about 30 days with one organ.
LanguageData.CW.IntegratedResearchTT: Integrated research make it so certain vanilla research will require research from this mod as a prerequisite. (Requires reload.)
